description:
Google IO Extended is a full day of sharing new features delivred on Google annual developer conference, Google IO 18.
We'll bring together Google technologies(web, mobile, cloud, Iot ...) enthusiasts, watching and delivering recaps of several technical keynotes from the Google IO 18 event such as Android, Flutter, Google Photos, Google Assistant... and will be having a codeLab session on Flutter (Google’s mobile app SDK for crafting high-quality native interfaces on iOS and Android in record time), Firebase, Android and Polymer.

Make sure to RSVP to receive upcoming information about this event, and if you would like to learn more about Google IO 18 please visit https://events.google.com/io/recap/
